history.proof: intros h st t n pli plt es ci st' m H. symmetry in H. destruct (handleAppendEntries _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _) as [st'' ps] eqn:Heq. apply handleAppendEntries_same_lastApplied in Heq. rewrite <- Heq. scongruence depth: 3use: handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted, handleAppendEntriesReply_same_lastApplied.

ctx: intros h st t n pli plt es ci st' m H.
exceptions.tactic: apply handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted in Heq; try auto.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t0 : term) (n0 : name) (pli0 : logIndex) (plt0 : term) (es0 : list entry) (ci0 : logIndex) (st'0 : raft_data) (m0 : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t0 n0 pli0 plt0 es0 ci0 = (st'0, m0) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t0 n0 pli0 plt0 es0 ci0 -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st'0)" on hypothesis of type "lastApplied st'' = lastApplied st".

ctx: intros h st t n pli plt es ci st' m H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (n0 : name) (st0 : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t0 : nat) (es0 : list entry) (b : bool) (st'0 : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply n0 st0 src t0 es0 b = (st'0, l) -> lastApplied st'0 = lastApplied st0" on hypothesis of type "(st', m) = (st'', ps)".

original: intros h st t n pli plt es ci st' m H. symmetry in H. destruct (handleAppendEntries _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _) as [st'' ps] eqn:Heq. apply handleAppendEntries_same_lastApplied in Heq. rewrite <- Heq. apply handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted in Heq; try auto. apply handleAppendEntriesReply_same_lastApplied in H. auto.
